verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, if you will receive <S%H3947><s%> my words <S%H561><s%>, and hide <S%H6845><s%> my commandments with you <S%H4687><s%>;
So that you incline <S%H7181><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> unto wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and apply <S%H5186><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> to understanding <S%H8394><s%>;
Yes <S%H7121><s%>, if you cry after knowledge <S%H998><s%>, and lift up <S%H5414><s%> your voice <S%H6963><s%> for understanding <S%H8394><s%>;
If you seek <S%H1245><s%> her as silver <S%H3701><s%>, and search <S%H2664><s%> for her as for hidden treasures <S%H4301><s%>;
Then shall you understand <S%H995><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and find <S%H4672><s%> the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> comes knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
He lays up <S%H6845><s%> sound wisdom <S%H8454><s%> for the righteous <S%H3477><s%>: he is a shield <S%H4043><s%> to them that walk <S%H1980><s%> uprightly <S%H8537><s%>.
He keeps <S%H5341><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and preserves <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of his saints <S%H2623><s%>.
Then shall you understand <S%H995><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and equity <S%H4339><s%>; Yes <S%H2896><s%>, every good path <S%H4570><s%>.
When wisdom <S%H2451><s%> enters <S%H935><s%> into your heart <S%H3820><s%>, and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is pleasant <S%H5276><s%> unto your soul <S%H5315><s%>;
Discretion <S%H4209><s%> shall preserve <S%H8104><s%> you <S%H8394><s%>, understanding shall keep you <S%H5341><s%>:
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> you from the way <S%H1870><s%> of the evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, from the man that speaks <S%H1696><s%> perverse things <S%H8419><s%>;
Who leave <S%H5800><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of uprightness <S%H3476><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%>;
Who rejoice <S%H8056><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, and delight <S%H1523><s%> in the perverseness <S%H8419><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>;
Whose ways <S%H734><s%> are crooked <S%H6141><s%>, and they are perverse <S%H3868><s%> in their paths <S%H4570><s%>:
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> you from the strange <S%H2114><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, even from the stranger <S%H5237><s%> which flatters <S%H2505><s%> with her words <S%H561><s%>;
Which forsakes <S%H5800><s%> the guide <S%H441><s%> of her youth <S%H5271><s%>, and forgets <S%H7911><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of her God <S%H430><s%>.
For her house <S%H1004><s%> inclines <S%H7743><s%> unto death <S%H4194><s%>, and her paths <S%H4570><s%> unto the dead <S%H7496><s%>.
None that go <S%H935><s%> unto her return again <S%H7725><s%>, neither take they hold <S%H5381><s%> of the paths <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>.
That you may walk <S%H3212><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> men <S%H8104><s%>, and keep the paths <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
For the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall live <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and the perfect <S%H8549><s%> shall remain in it <S%H3498><s%>.
But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the transgressors <S%H898><s%> shall be rooted out of it <S%H5255><s%>.
